scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp index.html build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js && cp app.js build/
scripts.watch:js: npm run build:js && chokidar app.js -c 'npm run build:js'
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:unminified && npm run build:css:minified
scripts.watch:css: npm run watch:css:unminified & npm run watch:css:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.build:css:unminified: npm run clean:css:unminified && lessc --source-map styles/main.less build/meetup-finder.css
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css && chokidar 'styles/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:css:minified: npm run clean:css:minified && lessc --clean-css --source-map styles/main.less build/meetup-finder.min.css
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css && chokidar 'styles/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
